entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
